name: Li'l Red Planet
description:
-Disclaimer-

This game was created over the weekend, in a 48hr in-house game-jam event. The theme was taken from the previous Ludum Dare 38 theme: A Small World. This game is made using GameMaker Studio 2.

-Introduction-

You are a red dwarf planet in a system of other larger planets. You need to gather stardust and grow in mass to stand a chance of surviving inevitable collisions. How many stardust particles can you catch? 

-Controls-
WASD
W - move up
A - move left
S - move down
D - move right

Directional Arrows
Up - move up
Down - move down
Left - move left
Right - move right

-Version History-
0.4 - 02/02/18
